articles.headline: Launch of Satya Sai Centennial Sadhana
articles.content:
This week marks the auspicious beginning of our 52-week Sadhana journey leading up to the Satya Sai Centennial celebration. The inaugural session commenced with three soul-stirring bhajans:
  • Jai Jai Jai Gananayaka Jai Jai Vighna Vinashaka
  • Aruna Ramana Sri Guru Deva
  • Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
This divine selection set the perfect atmosphere for our spiritual practice.
articles.author: Editorial Team

articles.headline: 108 Names of Bhagawan: Week 1 Reflection
articles.content:
As part of our weekly practice, we contemplated on the first two names of Bhagawan:
  • OM Sri Sai Nathaaya Namaha
  • OM Sri Sai Lakshmi Naarayanaya Namaha
The congregation participated in a focused 5-minute Likhitha Nama Japam, deepening their connection with divine names.
articles.author: Spiritual Team

articles.headline: Young Adults Share Their Sai Journey
articles.content: During the Thanksgiving holiday gathering, Young Adults (YAs) engaged in an enriching open discussion. They shared personal experiences about connecting with Swami in their daily lives, reflected on impactful moments from their SSE classes, and offered valuable insights for current SSE students. The session concluded with the traditional aarti followed by dinner prasadam.
articles.author: YA Team

articles.headline: Service to Veterans: Winter Essentials Drive
articles.content: Exemplifying Swami's message of selfless service, our Young Adults concluded the evening with a special service project, preparing winter essential packages for homeless veterans in our locality. This initiative demonstrates the practical application of Swami's teachings of love in action.
articles.author: Service Team

spiritualHighlight.focus: First two names of the 108 Names of Bhagawan
